item.title: Inserting a element into a html button
item.dc:creator: @Saige Saige
item.description:
@Saige wrote:

How would I input

into the below code the update_paragraph is coming from a file called answer.js because when I just add update_paragraph into the value it just says update_paragraph on the button I want it to grab the answer and output it onto the button

<label> <input type="submit" name="Poll" value="Test" id="Poll_0" /> </label>

in the answer.js there is:

[code=javascript]var counter = 0;
var lines = [‘Lol’];

function update() {
document.getElementById(‘update_paragraph’).innerHTML = lines[counter];
counter++;
setTimeout(update, 10 * 60 * 10);
}

update();[/code]
